reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I traveled to San Antonio from North Carolina for our 10 year anniversary. We stayed in the Luxembourg Room for 3 nights. Even though it is their smallest room it was beautiful and quaint. The bed was so comfortable we did not want to get up in the morning. The entire house is decorated so nicely and Ron and Prudence make you feel right at home. We were served breakfast each morning and all I can say is bring your appetite. The food was delicious!!! If you are ever in the San Antonio area and are looking for a B&B this is it. We will definitely be staying here the next time we visit Texas.
reviews.title: Loved it, Loved it, Loved it!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I were travelling with my sister and her husband so we actually had access to 2 rooms...the English Room and the French Room. Both were decorated beautifully and were comfortable and very clean. The bathrooms were not overly large but big enough. The shower in the English Room is AWESOME. The bed was heavenly with very luxurious linens. The house itself has been decorated to retain its hystorical background without being stuffy. Ron and Prudence are very welcoming hosts. They are both very helpful in steering you in whatever direction you might like to go and pretty much give you the run of the house. The breakfasts look great and taste better and access to soda, beer or wine is a really nice touch. The only drawback for us was the distance to the Riverwalk area. However, with Ron's help and directions we were able to navigate with relative ease. This was a really great place to stay!
reviews.title: Great Getaway

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: We stayed here during my husband's Air Force BMT graduation. It was the perfect relaxing getaway for him. We stayed in the French room, which is beutifully decorated, clean, and comfortable. It has a nice balcony that overlooks their wonderful garden. Prudence and Ron were very hospitable. Prudence was very good at remembering our names, which I appreciated! Their house was so welcoming and comfortable, and the breakfast was delicious. They even served it at a time that accomodated us. They were so helpful and thought of everything! The best part was the price! They are so reasonably priced and even gave us a military discount! If we come back to San Antonio we'll definitely stay here again!
reviews.title: Air Force Graduation--Made the weekend perfect!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Ruckman Haus is probably the best B&B we have stayed at (& we have stayed at many). It is located on a quiet street in the Historic district, about 2 mi from the Riverwalk. We chose the Sun Room mainly because it had a King Bed & a private sun deck. It, like all the rooms were lovley. Excellent bed & amenities. There are 4 rooms on the second floor & one on the third. Two of the second floor rooms have a large varandas & ours had a sun deck. All have A/C & ceiling fans. Our room also had a "multi-jet" (5) shower heads which have you a nice message.
reviews.title: 5***** B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Now we come to the best part , the breakfast.... WOW !! Hudge portions. One morning we had French Toast (4 pieces) & 6 links of sausage. The othe time it was Eggs Benidect. Excellent. All served with juices, & fresh fruits. You will NOT go away hungry.
reviews.title: Relaxing, beautiful home with privacy and goodies...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Ron and Prudence thought of everything before opening their B & B from the best breakfasts I've ever eaten to the beautiful and comfortable rooms. I would stay in any of the rooms. They have wonderful bedding, flat screen TVs, water and sodas, balconies, and decks. They always has wine, margaritas, and hot drinks for their guests. Your car is parked in a gated area. When asked for restaurant suggestions, their choices were wonderful and they always provided you with the best directions. We wanted an idea of what we could do the hour and a half before our flight left and they recommended the botannical gardens. What a perfect choice to end our vacation. I would recommend the Ruckman Haus to anyone.
reviews.title: I loved this B & B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We really enjoyed our 2 night stay at Ruckman Haus.
reviews.title: A Fantastic Place !!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Ron and Prudence were the perfect hosts and went out of their way to ensure we had a good time. I think Ron has visited all the bars in restaurants and has an opinion on them all.
reviews.title: A Lovely Hidden Gem with Gorgeous Rooms and the Best Breakfast I've Ever Had!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Its a mile and a half outside town, we got a cab in the evening and had a nice walk in the morning. Secure parking.
reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: We stayed in the Sun Room which was great, lovely room, a lounge area and a private deck !!
reviews.title: Ruckman Haus is wonderful, LOVED our stay!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You are spoiled when you stay at the Ruckman Haus. The rooms are clean, it's a quiet location, but still close enough to town to do anything you need. Prudence provides a great service, anything and everything you need, whether it's where is the closest Art Gallery to where to get a great dinner. This B&B is much better than the Emily Morgan Hotel, and cheaper, not that you will notice with all the amenities. A very nice garden and private deck provide relaxation. The beds and linens are wonderful, you'll never want to leave the room. The breakfasts are to die for , Thank you Ron !
reviews.title: WOW, Very Nice !!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Prudence and Ron, we couldn't have been happier with our stay !
reviews.title: Excellent value for the money.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We'll be back !!!!
reviews.title: Our first stay in a B&B, but definitely not our last!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed 2 nights in the Sun room. The room was spacious and well lit. It offers a private deck at roof height. Trees thick foliage and the roof itself offer privacy. The rooms furniture was very comfortable to cuddle up with a good book. There isn't a traditional closet in the room. However there is a space across from the bathroom sink with ample hanger space and small bench to store your suitcase. An antique chest of drawers houses the clothes you do not hang. The shower stall has 5 directional water spray heads and the water will be as hot as you can stand it. Prudence Ruckman knows the city well and will gladly assist you finding points of interest. The night was quiet because you are Not on the Riverwalk. It is a few minutes away. The common areas are comfortable and clean and interestingly decorated. I had no issues concerning security in the neighborhood when parking at the curb although you can park behind a security gate if you prefer. The breakfasts are included in the room rate and are wonderful. You will not go away hungry! Ron and Prudence would be happy to share a little bit of heaven on earth with you. I know that I will return again as business brings me back to San Antonio.
reviews.title: Charming residence 2 miles from Riverwalk

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Ruckman Haus was a nice surprise! Ron and Prudence were kind and welcoming, and the breakfast was incredible! So incredible that we immediately tried to recreate Belgian waffles with fresh strawberriers and blueberries upon our return! Our room was quaint, well decorated, and comfortable. Hardwood floors and unique artwork added a nice touch to the English Room. And, the pedestal sink, double head shower, and strategic lighting in the bathroom definitely added luxury. Nestled and surrounded with plenty of foliage, one can easily forget its resedential location. We really felt at home here.
reviews.title: As perfect as expected!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: Four of us stayed at Ruckman Haus for a few nights in Feb 2010. Ron and Prudence are excellent hosts and Ron's waffles are truly amazing! Thanks folks.
reviews.title: Great place, wonderful hosts

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled on business
reviews.text: I thoroughly enjoyed the 5 nights I spent at the Ruckman Haus. Prudence and Ron were excellent hosts, more than accomodating. The house was lovely- tastefully done, comfortable, great outdoor and indoor spaces.
reviews.title: Beautiful house, great hosts

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All-around great experience!
reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - Beautiful B&B
reviews.title: We will stay here time and time again!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - Incredible food
reviews.title: Wonderful Anniversary Trip
